translation: Friends! Welcome!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Friends! Welcome!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: ......{#Name="Zero"}
source: ......{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Two.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Two.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Two is a tad exhausted at the moment.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Lady Two is a tad exhausted at the moment.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I, uh... Heh heh heh. Well, what can I say?{#Name="Cent"}
source: I, uh... Heh heh heh. Well, what can I say?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I guess my physical gifts speak for themselves.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I guess my physical gifts speak for themselves.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: You know, I actually try to make sure she enjoys our little liaisons just as—{#Name="Cent"}
source: You know, I actually try to make sure she enjoys our little liaisons just as—{#Name="Cent"}

translation: TWO!{#Name="Zero"}
source: TWO!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Two is lost in her dreams right now.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Lady Two is lost in her dreams right now.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Perhaps you could try not to interrupt.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Perhaps you could try not to interrupt.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: ...Her mind's gone, isn't it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Her mind's gone, isn't it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: She wasn't fully developed.{#Name="Zero"}
source: She wasn't fully developed.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Her body couldn't handle the power of her song.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Her body couldn't handle the power of her song.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hand her over. I'll end her suffering.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hand her over. I'll end her suffering.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeeeah, I'm afraid I can't do that.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Yeeeah, I'm afraid I can't do that.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Do you have any idea what you're doing?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Do you have any idea what you're doing?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, of course I don't! Duh!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Well, of course I don't! Duh!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I mean, look—I'm just some idiot old disciple, after all.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I mean, look—I'm just some idiot old disciple, after all.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: It's pretty simple, really. All I do is put{LF}my nose to the grindstone and follow orders.{#Name="Cent"}
source: It's pretty simple, really. All I do is put{LF}my nose to the grindstone and follow orders.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Speaking of which, she kind of ordered me to kill you, sooo...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Speaking of which, she kind of ordered me to kill you, sooo...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: You really are an idiot.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You really are an idiot.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: All right, my lady. Open up and say "aaaaaah..."{#Name="Cent"}
source: All right, my lady. Open up and say "aaaaaah..."{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Aaaaaahh...{#Name="Two"}
source: Aaaaaahh...{#Name="Two"}

translation: Yes! Perfect! Just like that—keep it up!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Yes! Perfect! Just like that—keep it up!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Behold the second song:{#Name="Cent"}
source: Behold the second song:{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Great Fist of Antiquity!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Great Fist of Antiquity!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: The blood-wind storms that slash through fate...{#Name="Cent"}
source: The blood-wind storms that slash through fate...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: The steely hand that has sworn allegiance...{#Name="Cent"}
source: The steely hand that has sworn allegiance...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Cross the countless swarms of writhing dead!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Cross the countless swarms of writhing dead!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I, Cent, summon thee in my name...{#Name="Cent"}
source: I, Cent, summon thee in my name...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Egregori, dance!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Egregori, dance!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Mich...ael...{#Name="Two"}
source: Mich...ael...{#Name="Two"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You...You evolved...again.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You...You evolved...again.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ......{#Name="Zero"}
source: ......{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh. I guess that's that.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Huh. I guess that's that.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Welp! A clever and handsome man like me knows when he's beaten.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Welp! A clever and handsome man like me knows when he's beaten.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I suppose from this point on...I'll be serving you, Lady Zero.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I suppose from this point on...I'll be serving you, Lady Zero.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: You're not gonna follow Two to the grave?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You're not gonna follow Two to the grave?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Heavens, no!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Heavens, no!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I just want to serve an Intoner. I really don't care which one.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I just want to serve an Intoner. I really don't care which one.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: After all...I'm just a big idiot, right?{#Name="Cent"}
source: After all...I'm just a big idiot, right?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Enemy sighted! All men, take position!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Enemy sighted! All men, take position!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: We must keep our beloved Lady Two safe!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: We must keep our beloved Lady Two safe!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Don't retreat! Never retreat!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Don't retreat! Never retreat!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: It's Zero, the black swan of falsehoods!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: It's Zero, the black swan of falsehoods!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: She'll rue the day she challenged Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: She'll rue the day she challenged Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Nooo! I'm scared! Get me off the front line!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Nooo! I'm scared! Get me off the front line!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Hang in there! If we die, we die together!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Hang in there! If we die, we die together!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Hold your ground! We're Lady Two's last vanguard!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Hold your ground! We're Lady Two's last vanguard!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Yeah! It's time to show her our invincible iron fist!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Yeah! It's time to show her our invincible iron fist!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Goddammit. He had to go and summon{LF}these gourd-head things.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddammit. He had to go and summon{LF}these gourd-head things.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh? But Lady Two thinks they're much{LF}more useful than plain old gourds.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh? But Lady Two thinks they're much{LF}more useful than plain old gourds.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Oh—trivia time! Do you know why some{LF}gourds are narrow in the middle?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh—trivia time! Do you know why some{LF}gourds are narrow in the middle?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: So they can rearrange their nutrients{LF}halfway down the fruit!{#Name="Cent"}
source: So they can rearrange their nutrients{LF}halfway down the fruit!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: It's SCIENCE! Wah-chaaa!{#Name="Cent"}
source: It's SCIENCE! Wah-chaaa!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Stop pretending you know what{LF}you're talking about, idiot!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Stop pretending you know what{LF}you're talking about, idiot!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Idiot? Mmm, yeah. Rude.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Idiot? Mmm, yeah. Rude.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Now, I'm a kind-hearted man, so I'm{LF}usually willing to forgive such insults...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Now, I'm a kind-hearted man, so I'm{LF}usually willing to forgive such insults...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: But that was really uncalled for.{LF}Wasn't it, Lady Two?{#Name="Cent"}
source: But that was really uncalled for.{LF}Wasn't it, Lady Two?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: An idiot's an idiot.{#Name="Zero"}
source: An idiot's an idiot.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: And Two lost her soul because she{LF}believed all the idiot crap you spouted.{#Name="Zero"}
source: And Two lost her soul because she{LF}believed all the idiot crap you spouted.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That makes her the biggest idiot of all. {#Name="Zero"}
source: That makes her the biggest idiot of all. {#Name="Zero"}

translation: ENOUGH! You will STOP belittling{LF}my lady at ONCE!{#Name="Cent"}
source: ENOUGH! You will STOP belittling{LF}my lady at ONCE!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Fighting two of these at once is rough.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Fighting two of these at once is rough.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Maybe we can all be friends instead!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Maybe we can all be friends instead!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Doubt it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Doubt it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: トウ様、おいたわしや……。あの様子では、まぐわいを楽しむどころではありませんな{#Name="オクタ"}
source: トウ様、おいたわしや……。あの様子では、まぐわいを楽しむどころではありませんな{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: かもね！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: かもね！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ここは一つ、私めが新たな境地を切り拓いて見せましょうぞ{#Name="オクタ"}
source: ここは一つ、私めが新たな境地を切り拓いて見せましょうぞ{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: トウとヤるのは勝手だが、ヤる前にこいつらを倒していけよ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: トウとヤるのは勝手だが、ヤる前にこいつらを倒していけよ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: あとちょっとですね、ゼロ！{#Name="ディト"}
source: あとちょっとですね、ゼロ！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: ああ。一気にいくぞ！！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ああ。一気にいくぞ！！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Good! CRUSH IT!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Good! CRUSH IT!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ゼロ様、お見事！{#Name="オクタ"}
source: ゼロ様、お見事！{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: お世辞を言ってるヒマがあったら、{LF}一体でも多く倒せ！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: お世辞を言ってるヒマがあったら、{LF}一体でも多く倒せ！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: It sure is dark in here, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It sure is dark in here, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Yep.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yep.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If you're scared, we can totally turn back!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: If you're scared, we can totally turn back!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Nope.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nope.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: By the way, why were you completely{LF}out of touch back in the desert?{#Name="Zero"}
source: By the way, why were you completely{LF}out of touch back in the desert?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: We were about to die of exhaustion out there.{#Name="Zero"}
source: We were about to die of exhaustion out there.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: They were using a song to put up{LF}some kind of magic wall.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: They were using a song to put up{LF}some kind of magic wall.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I couldn't get in until you beat up the bad guys.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I couldn't get in until you beat up the bad guys.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: But I made sure to do my business{LF}before I came for you!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But I made sure to do my business{LF}before I came for you!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: And I covered it in sand just like you taught me!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: And I covered it in sand just like you taught me!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: That's good, right? That's really good!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: That's good, right? That's really good!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: *Sigh*{#Name="Zero"}
source: *Sigh*{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hey, Zero? What's wrong with Two,{LF}anyway?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Hey, Zero? What's wrong with Two,{LF}anyway?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: She fought her own powers and lost.{#Name="Zero"}
source: She fought her own powers and lost.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You need a strong mind to withstand{LF}the power of a song.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You need a strong mind to withstand{LF}the power of a song.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: She didn't have it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: She didn't have it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So she's just sick, right?{LF}Can we cure her? Huh? Can we?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: So she's just sick, right?{LF}Can we cure her? Huh? Can we?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No. And besides, I'm trying to kill{LF}her here!{#Name="Zero"}
source: No. And besides, I'm trying to kill{LF}her here!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Just one left, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Just one left, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Yep. Let's finish this!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yep. Let's finish this!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Get 'em, Zero, get 'em!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Get 'em, Zero, get 'em!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Me? You're the one who has to get 'em!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Me? You're the one who has to get 'em!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Two's angel... It's losing its armor...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Lady Two's angel... It's losing its armor...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Yeah, 'cause we're attacking it!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, 'cause we're attacking it!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, my. If it loses it all, this will be bad.{LF}Very, very bad...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh, my. If it loses it all, this will be bad.{LF}Very, very bad...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Don't relax yet, friends.{LF}This show is faaar from over!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Don't relax yet, friends.{LF}This show is faaar from over!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Zero, look! He's running away!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero, look! He's running away!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Don't let 'em get away!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Don't let 'em get away!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Kill Two.{#Name=" "}
source: Kill Two.{#Name=" "}

translation: Defeat the Egregori!{#Name=" "}
source: Defeat the Egregori!{#Name=" "}

translation: エグリゴリを倒した！{#Name=" "}
source: エグリゴリを倒した！{#Name=" "}
